languages.text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}Operative{/g} attacks an enemy that is at full {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}, that attack deals +{uip|DamageBonus|ed9d1434d0fd41e2a382a2efe0a2018a}% more {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to that enemy.
languages.original_text: Когда {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}оперативник{/g} атакует противника, обладающего полным запасом {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровья{/g}, атака наносит на {uip|DamageBonus|ed9d1434d0fd41e2a382a2efe0a2018a}% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урона{/g} больше.

traits.locale_text: Whenever the Adept attacks an enemy that is at full wounds, that attack deals +<u>10+2×(PER bonus)%</u> more damage to that enemy.
Whenever the Adept attacks an enemy that is at full wounds, that attack deals +<u>(10 + 2 × PER bonus)</u>% more damage to that enemy.

languages.original_text: Whenever the Adept attacks an enemy that is at full wounds, that attack deals +<u>(10 + 2 × PER bonus)</u>% more damage to that enemy.

traits.locale_text: Когда адепт атакует противника, обладающего полным запасом здоровья, атака наносит на <u>(10 + 2 × бонус ВОС)</u>% урона больше.
Когда адепт атакует противника, обладающего полным запасом здоровья, атака наносит на <u>(10 + 2 × бонус ВОС)</u>% урона больше.
Когда адепт атакует противника, обладающего полным запасом {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровья{/g}, атака наносит на {uip|DamageBonus|ed9d1434d0fd41e2a382a2efe0a2018a}% урона больше.

languages.text: 当{g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}特工{/g}攻击满{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}的敌人时，此次攻击造成的{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}提高{uip|DamageBonus|ed9d1434d0fd41e2a382a2efe0a2018a}%。
languages.original_text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}Operative{/g} attacks an enemy that is at full {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}, that attack deals +{uip|DamageBonus|ed9d1434d0fd41e2a382a2efe0a2018a}% more {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to that enemy.

traits.locale_text: 当技师{g|Encyclopedia:Attack}攻击{/g}满{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}的敌人时，此次攻击造成的{g|Encyclopedia:Damage}伤害{/g}提高<u>（10+2×{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}感知{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}）</u>%。
当技师{g|Encyclopedia:Attack}攻击{/g}满{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}的敌人时，此次攻击造成的{g|Encyclopedia:Damage}伤害{/g}提高{uip|DamageBonus|ed9d1434d0fd41e2a382a2efe0a2018a}%。

languages.text: Cuando el {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}agente{/g} ataca a un enemigo cuyas {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g}, estén al máximo, su ataque inflige un +{uip|DamageBonus|ed9d1434d0fd41e2a382a2efe0a2018a} % más de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} al enemigo.
languages.original_text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}Operative{/g} attacks an enemy that is at full {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}, that attack deals +{uip|DamageBonus|ed9d1434d0fd41e2a382a2efe0a2018a}% more {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to that enemy.

traits.locale_text: Cuando el agente ataca a un enemigo cuyas {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g}, estén al máximo, su ataque inflige un +{uip|DamageBonus|ed9d1434d0fd41e2a382a2efe0a2018a} % más de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} al enemigo.

Cuando el adepto {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}ataca{/g} a un enemigo cuyas {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g}, estén al máximo, su ataque inflige un +{uip|DamageBonus|ed9d1434d0fd41e2a382a2efe0a2018a} % más de {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}daño{/g} al enemigo.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}オペレーター{/g}が{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}体力{/g}が最大の敵を攻撃すると、その敵に与える{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}が+{uip|DamageBonus|ed9d1434d0fd41e2a382a2efe0a2018a}%増加する。
languages.original_text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}Operative{/g} attacks an enemy that is at full {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}, that attack deals +{uip|DamageBonus|ed9d1434d0fd41e2a382a2efe0a2018a}% more {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to that enemy.

traits.locale_text: アデプトが{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}体力{/g}が最大の敵を{g|Encyclopedia:Attack}攻撃{/g}すると、その敵に与える{g|Encyclopedia:Damage}ダメージ{/g}が+<u>（10 + 2 × {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}PER{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}）</u>%増加する。
アデプトが{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}体力{/g}が最大の敵を{g|Encyclopedia:Attack}攻撃{/g}すると、その敵に与える{g|Encyclopedia:Damage}ダメージ{/g}が+{uip|DamageBonus|ed9d1434d0fd41e2a382a2efe0a2018a}%増加する。

languages.text: Greift der {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}Agent{/g} einen Feind angreift, der volle {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g} hat, verursacht dieser Angriff +{uip|DamageBonus|ed9d1434d0fd41e2a382a2efe0a2018a} % mehr {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g}.
languages.original_text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}Operative{/g} attacks an enemy that is at full {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}, that attack deals +{uip|DamageBonus|ed9d1434d0fd41e2a382a2efe0a2018a}% more {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to that enemy.

traits.locale_text: Immer wenn der Agent einen Feind angreift, der volle {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g} hat, fügt dieser Angriff diesem Feind +{uip|DamageBonus|ed9d1434d0fd41e2a382a2efe0a2018a} % mehr {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} zu.

Wann immer der Adept einen Feind {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}angreift{/g}, der volle {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g} hat, fügt dieser Angriff diesem Feind +{uip|DamageBonus|ed9d1434d0fd41e2a382a2efe0a2018a} % mehr {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}Schaden{/g} zu.

languages.text: Chaque fois que l'{g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}agent{/g} attaque un ennemi dont la réserve de {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g} est pleine, cette attaque inflige +{uip|DamageBonus|ed9d1434d0fd41e2a382a2efe0a2018a} % de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} supplémentaires à l'ennemi.
languages.original_text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}Operative{/g} attacks an enemy that is at full {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}, that attack deals +{uip|DamageBonus|ed9d1434d0fd41e2a382a2efe0a2018a}% more {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to that enemy.

traits.locale_text: Chaque fois que l'Adepte {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attaque{/g} un ennemi dont la réserve de {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g} est pleine, cette attaque inflige +<u>(10 + 2 × {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}PER{/g})</u> % de {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}dégâts{/g} supplémentaires à l'ennemi.

Chaque fois que l'Adepte {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attaque{/g} un ennemi dont la réserve de {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g} est pleine, cette attaque inflige +{uip|DamageBonus|ed9d1434d0fd41e2a382a2efe0a2018a} % de {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}dégâts{/g} supplémentaires à l'ennemi.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}Ajan{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}sağlık{/g} puanı tam olan bir düşmana saldırdığında saldırı +%{uip|DamageBonus|ed9d1434d0fd41e2a382a2efe0a2018a} daha fazla {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasar{/g} verir.
